252 
253 // operations
254 
255 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position) const
256 {
257  CVector2d result;
258  m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
259 
260  return result + m_translation;
261 }
262 
263 
264 inline void CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position, CVector2d& result) const
265 {
266  m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
267  result += m_translation;
268 }
269 
270 
271 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetApplyToDelta(const CVector2d& delta) const
272 {
273  CVector2d retVal;
274 
275  m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(delta, retVal);
276 
277  return retVal;
278 }
279 
280 
281 inline void CAffine2d::GetApplyToDelta(const CVector2d& delta, CVector2d& result) const
282 {
283  m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(delta, result);
284 }
285 
286 
287 inline CAffine2d CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector) const
288 {
289  return CAffine2d(m_deformMatrix, m_translation + vector);
290 }
291 
292 
293 inline void CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector, CAffine2d& result) const
294 {
295  result.GetDeformMatrixRef() = m_deformMatrix;
296  result.GetTranslationRef() = m_translation + vector;
297 }
298 
299 
300 inline void CAffine2d::Translate(const CVector2d& vector)
301 {
302  m_translation += vector;
303 }
304 
305 
306 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetInvertedApply(const CVector2d& position) const
307 {

309

326 // operators
327 
328 inline bool CAffine2d::operator==(const CAffine2d& transform) const
329 {
330  return (m_translation == transform.m_translation) && (m_deformMatrix == transform.m_deformMatrix);
331 }
332 
333 
334 inline bool CAffine2d::operator!=(const CAffine2d& transform) const
335 {
336  return (m_translation != transform.m_translation) || (m_deformMatrix != transform.m_deformMatrix);
337 }
